title: Forms SKCanvasView and Margins..
body:
Not sure if it is me or the SK Views.
I set a Margin on the View to get some whitespace but it was completely ignored.

Next I wrapped it in a StackLayout (nasty I know) with a Margin on the StackLayout and the Canvas didn't render until I added VerticalOptions and Horizontal Options of "FillAndExpand".
Still it ignored the Margin.

Changed the Margin on the StackLayout to a Padding - BOOM - worked.

            
```
<StackLayout Padding="5" BackgroundColor="Orange">
       <skia:SKCanvasView  VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand">
             <skia:SKGLView.GestureRecognizers>
                    <TapGestureRecognizer Command="{Binding TappedCommand}"/>
            </skia:SKGLView.GestureRecognizers>
      </skia:SKCanvasView>
</StackLayout>

```

I'll try to find time to knock up a repo project.  In the meantime, any ideas?
